sentences.en: If you have an unhealthy economy, the poor will get hurt worst because they are the weakest.
sentences.cn: 如果经济不景气，穷人将遭受最大打击，因为他们是最弱的群体。

sentences.en: Fortune says the weakest of the malls have closed.
sentences.cn: 《财富》杂志表示，最弱的购物中心已经关闭。

sentences.en: The goaltending and defence are among the weakest in the league.
sentences.cn: 守门和防守属于本届联赛中最薄弱的环节。
